definition[0]: the introduction of someone into a new job, company, official position etc, or the ceremony at which this is done
example[0]: Mrs Simpson is responsible for the induction of new library staff.
definition[1]: the process of making a woman give birth to her baby by giving her a special drug
definition[2]: the production of electricity in one object by another that already has electrical or magnetic power
definition[3]: a process of thought that uses known facts to produce general rules or principles
definition[4]: the introduction and training of someone into a new job
example[3]: A team from personnel will conduct the inductions.
definition[5]: a ceremony in which someone is officially introduced into a new job or organization
example[4]: Lauffer gave a 30 minute speech at his induction yesterday.
